title: Atlanta DA Fights Trump's Bid to End Election Interference Probe

title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning May 15th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we look at how the board and management need to work together to handle emerging risks and the questions directors need to ask to understand management’s risk identification and tracking processes. Also, how a cyber attack at a newspaper led to serious operational disruption and one company’s move towards cybersecurity control transparency.
